AT.name: Family Fishing
AT.description: Family Fishing ist ein rasantes Angelspiel für Wetteiferer, das von Arc System Works entwickelt wurde. Geh mit deiner virtuellen Familie fischen und kämpfe in diesem hek- tischen Chaos im Arcade-Stil um den Sieg! Die Spieler treten gegeneinander an und versuchen vor dem Ende jeder Runde die meisten Punkte zu erzielen. Fülle deinen Spezialattacken-Balken, um das Blatt zu wenden und Fänge einfacher zu ergattern! Peil den großen Fisch an, der viele Punkte abwirft, oder fang sie alle, um zu gewinnen! Jeder Fisch gibt gewisse Punkte. Wirst du deine Punkte langsam ansammeln, indem du kleinere und gewöhnlichere Fische angelst? Oder wirst du alles riskieren und versuchen mit einem äußerst seltenen Exemplar den Fang deines Lebens zu machen? Wirf Rauchbomben, um deine Gegner zu stören und nutz den dadurch entstandenen Vorteil zu deinen Gunsten. Hier geht es um ein Angelspiel, in dem deine Strategie auf die Probe gestellt wird! Sammle Punkte und verbessere deine Angelruten und Köder, um besseren und selteneren Fisch anzulocken.

AU.name: Family Fishing
AU.description: Family Fishing is a frenetic, competitive fishing game developed by Arc System Works. Go fishing with your virtual family and battle against them in fast paced arcade-style mayhem! Players compete against each other to score the most points before the end of each round. Build up your Special Attack gauge bar to turn the tide of battle and make easier catches! Aim for the big fish with high bounty points or catch them all to win! Each fish has assigned points. Will you slowly collect points by catching smaller and more common fish? Or will you risk it all on that rare catch of a lifetime? Throw smoke bombs to disrupt your opponents and seize the advantage! It’s a fishing game where your strategy is put to the test! Collect points and upgrade your fishing rods and lures to catch bigger and rarer fish!

BG.name: Family Fishing
BG.description: Family Fishing is a frenetic, competitive fishing game developed by Arc System Works. Go fishing with your virtual family and battle against them in fast paced arcade-style mayhem! Or will you risk it all on that rare catch of a lifetime? Throw smoke bombs to disrupt your opponents and seize the advantage! It’s a fishing game where your strategy is put to the test! Collect points and upgrade your fishing rods and lures to catch bigger and rarer fish!

BE.name: Family Fishing
BE.description: Family Fishing est un jeu de pêche développé par Arc System Works. Partez à la pêche avec les membres de votre famille virtuelle et affrontez-les au cours de ce jeu d'arcade au rythme effréné ! Les joueurs se mesurent les uns aux autres pour marquer le meilleur score avant la fin de chaque tour. Faites grimper votre barre Attaque spéciale pour renverser la tendance ! Essayez de pêcher le plus gros poisson pour récolter un maximum de points ou attrapez-les tous pour remporter la partie ! Chaque poisson rapporte un certain nombre de points. Vous contenterez-vous de pêcher des petits poissons ou des espèces communes pour accumuler tranquillement les points ? Ou tenterez-vous le tout pour le tout en traquant un poisson rare comme on n'en pêche qu'une fois dans sa vie ? Lancez des fumigènes pour gêner vos adversaires et prendre l'avantage ! Testez vos talents de stratège ! Accumulez les points et améliorez vos cannes à pêche et vos appâts pour attraper des poissons plus gros et plus rares !

ES.name: Family Fishing
ES.description: Family Fishing es un juego de pesca competitivo y frenético desarrollado por Arc System Works. ¡Vete de pesca con tu familia virtual y lucha en medio de un caos rápido al estilo arcade! Los jugadores compiten entre sí para ver quién consigue más puntos al final de cada ronda. ¡Construye tu propio manómetro para cambiar la marea de la batalla y conseguir pescar más fácilmente! ¡Intenta pescar los peces más grandes para obtener puntos de bonificación más altos o péscalos a todos y gana! Cada pez tiene un número de puntos asignado. ¿Prefieres ir despacio pescando peces más pequeños y más comunes o arriesgarlo todo e intentar pescar ese pez poco común y conseguir así la mejor captura de tu vida? ¡Lanza bombas de humo para molestar a los adversarios y aprovecha esa ventaja! ¡Este es un juego de pesca en el que tu estrategia estará a prueba! ¡Acumula puntos y mejora tus cañas de pescar y señuelos para pescar a los peces más grandes y menos.

IT.name: Family Fishing
IT.description: Family Fishing è un gioco di pesca frenetico e competitivo creato da Arc System Works. Vai a pesca con la tua famiglia virtuale e sfida tutti in un massacrante gioco arcade dal ritmo serrato! I giocatori si affrontano per il miglior punteggio entro la fine di ciascun round. Riempi la barra dell'attacco speciale per capovolgere la situazione e pescare con più facilità! Punta ai pesci più grandi che danno più punti oppure pescali tutti per vincere! Ogni pesce ha un punteggio assegnato. Collezionerai punti poco per volta, pescando pesci più piccoli e comuni? Oppure rischierai il tutto per tutto con un'occasione d'oro? Lancia bombe fumogene per disturbare gli avversari e prendere il sopravvento. Questo gioco di pesca metterà alla prova la tua strategia! Raccogli punti e potenzia canne ed esche per pescare pesci più grandi e più rari!

NL.name: Family Fishing
NL.description: Family Fishing is een furieus hengelspel waar je het tegen andere spelers opneemt en is ontwikkeld door Arc System Works. Ga vissen met je virtuele familie en kijk wie de beste hengelaar is in razendsnelle en woeste arcade-stijl! Spelers nemen het tegen elkaar op om de hoogste score te halen voordat de ronde voorbij is. Verzamel genoeg energie op je speciale aanvalmeter om de strijd te keren en gemakkelijker vissen te vangen! Ga voor de grote vissen die veel punten opleveren of vang ze allemaal om het spel te winnen! Elke vis levert een bepaald aantal punten op. Kies jij ervoor om je score rustig op te bouwen door kleinere en vaak voorkomende vissen te vangen? Of gok je op die zeldzame trofeevis die zich moeilijk laat vangen? Gooi rookbommen om het je tegenstanders moeilijk te maken en grijp je kans! Dit hengelspel zal het uiterste vragen van je strategisch inzicht! Verzamel punten en upgrade je hengels en aas om grotere en zeldzame vissen te vangen!

NZ.name: Family Fishing
NZ.description: Family Fishing is a frenetic, competitive fishing game developed by Arc System Works. Go fishing with your virtual family and battle against them in fast paced arcade-style mayhem! Players compete against each other to score the most points before the end of each round. Build up your Special Attack gauge bar to turn the tide of battle and make easier catches! Or will you risk it all on that rare catch of a lifetime? Throw smoke bombs to disrupt your opponents and seize the advantage! It’s a fishing game where your strategy is put to the test! Collect points and upgrade your fishing rods and lures to catch bigger and rarer fish!

PT.name: Family Fishing
PT.description: Family Fishing é um frenético e competitivo jogo de pesca desenvolvido pela Arc System Works. Vai à pesca com a tua família virtual e vê quem é o melhor pescador neste alucinante jogo ao estilo de arcada! Os jogadores competem uns contra os outros para tentarem obter o máximo de pontos antes do final de cada ronda. Alimenta o teu indicador de Ataque Especial para inverteres a maré e pescares mais facilmente! Está de olho no grande peixe para obteres uma pontuação generosa ou apanha todos os peixes para ganhares! Cada peixe vale um determinado número de pontos. Vais amealhar pontos lentamente ao pescares peixes mais pequenos e comuns? Ou vais arriscar tudo por tudo em busca da pescaria de uma vida? Lança bombas de fumo para perturbares os teus adversários e aproveita a vantagem! Family Fishing é um jogo de pesca onde a tua estratégia é colocada à prova! Amealha pontos e melhora as tuas canas de pesca e iscos para apanhares peixes maiores e mais raros!

RU.name: Family Fishing
RU.description: Family Fishing – это буйная соревновательная игра в рыбалку, разработанная компанией Arc System Works. Отправляйтесь удить со своей виртуальной семьей и соревнуйтесь с ними в бесшабашной аркаде! Наберите больше всего очков к концу раунда. Заполняйте счетчик специального приема, чтобы повернуть ход соревнования в свою сторону и легче ловить рыбку! Постарайтесь подцепить крупную рыбу, чтобы сорвать солидный куш, либо выловить их все! Каждая рыба приносит свои очки. Будете ли вы медленно собирать очки, вылавливая обычную мелкую рыбешку? Или же рискнете и потратите все время, чтобы выловить редкую крупную рыбу? Бросайте дымовые шашки, чтобы срывать рыбалку своих соперников! Здесь можно «ловить рыбку в мутной воде»! Собирайте очки и улучшайте свои удочки и приманку, чтобы ловить более крупную и редкую рыбу!

SE.description: Family Fishing is a frenetic, competitive fishing game developed by Arc System Works. Go fishing with your virtual family and battle against them in fast paced arcade-style mayhem! ZA.description: Family Fishing is a frenetic, competitive fishing game developed by Arc System Works. Go fishing with your virtual family and battle against them in fast paced arcade-style mayhem! Players compete against each other to score the most points before the end of each round. Build up your Special Attack gauge bar to turn the tide of battle and make easier catches! Aim for the big fish with high bounty points or catch them all to win! Each fish has assigned points. Will you slowly collect points by catching smaller and more common fish? Or will you risk it all on that rare catch of a lifetime? Throw smoke bombs to disrupt your opponents and seize the advantage! It’s a fishing game where your strategy is put to the test! Collect points and upgrade your fishing rods and lures to catch bigger and rarer fish!
